version_description: What's new? We have fixed the bug that caused the app to crash on an earlier iOS version. We do apologise, and also want to say thank you for the quick and really constructive responses. We'd be happy to hear if this fixed the problem for you and if things are back to normal. Your Land Rover InControl Remote team.

What's new? We have fixed the bug that caused the app to crash on an earlier iOS version. We do apologise, and also want to say thank you for the quick and really constructive responses. We'd be happy to hear if this fixed the problem for you and if things are back to normal. Your Land Rover InControl Remote team.

What's new? We have fixed the bug that caused the app to crash on an earlier iOS version. We do apologise, and also want to say thank you for the quick and really constructive responses. We'd be happy to hear if this fixed the problem for you and if things are back to normal. Your Land Rover InControl Remote team.

•Improved the overall responsiveness of the app especially for users in areas with poor network coverage
•Updated the user interface for the app for iPhone 6s Plus users
•Fixed minor bugs

Thanks for your comments and feedback, we are constantly looking to improve our app performance and features.
Here are some of the updates you'll find in this release:

[new] In this release we have we moved to WatchOS2 providing a faster and better user experience for all our Apple Watch users.

Sometimes things go wrong, we apologise for any problems you had. Here is a list of the issues we fixed in this release:

[fixed] Some of you experienced an occasional crash on app launch.
[fixed] We brought back the address of your last parked location to the map on the home screen.
[fixed] We have also realigned the beep and flash animation.

Thanks for your comments and feedback, we are constantly looking to improve our app performance and features.

Sometimes things go wrong, we apologise for any problems you had. Here is a list of the issues we fixed in this release:

[fixed] Some of you experienced an occasional crash on app launch.
[fixed] We brought back the address of your last parked location to the map on the home screen.
[fixed] We have also realigned the beep and flash animation.

Thanks for your comments and feedback, we are constantly looking to improve our app performance and features.
Here are some of the updates you'll find in this release:

[new] You can now start to create your InControl Account from within the app, by pressing the create account button on the login screen.

Sometimes things go wrong, we apologise for any problems you had. Here is a list of the issues we fixed in this release:

[fixed] Some users could not launch their app on iOS 7.
[fixed] Some users experienced crashes on low latency networks.
[fixed] In some cases the app did not process the change of target temperature for a Remote Climate via Engine start.

Thanks for your comments and feedback, we are constantly looking to improve our app performance and features.

Here are some of the updates you’ll find in this release:
[new] Vehicle Health warnings like brake pad wear or tire pressure are now visible in the Vehicle Health Report
[new] Support for the new Discovery (incl. Remote Seat Fold)

Sometimes things go wrong, we apologise for any problems you had. Here is a list of the issues we fixed in this release:
[fixed] Some people have experienced issues stopping Remote Climate(via Fuel Fired heater)

Thanks for your comments and feedback, we are constantly looking to improve our app performance and features.

Sometimes things go wrong, we apologise for any problems you had. Here is a list of the issues we fixed in this release:
[fixed] A rounding issue on the app caused the Odometer value to be out of sync with the vehicle when displayed in miles. We have updated the app to use the same conversion rates as the vehicle.
[fixed] The app is now available in Japanese and Korean.

Thanks for your comments and feedback, we are constantly looking to improve our app performance and features. Here are some of the updates you’ll find in this release:

[new] We upgraded the interface between the app and “the cloud”. Please note that this is a mandatory update and that previous versions of the app will stop working shortly. Please update to the new version as soon as possible.

Thanks for your comments and feedback, we are constantly looking to improve our app performance and features. Here are some of the updates you’ll find in this release:

[new] App is now available in Denmark, Ireland, Poland, Sweden, Norway, Kazakhstan, Belarus and Armenia.

[new] The Remote will now be supported from iOS 8.0 only. This release and future app updates will not be available on devices running older versions of iOS.

Sometimes things go wrong, we apologize for any problems you had. Here is a list of the issues we fixed in this release:

[fixed] An update in the Remote Climate feature to further enhance stability and provide clear information when things go wrong.

[fixed] An issue with display of Engine Oil Warning status.

[fixed] A rare issue with display of Odometer value.

[fixed] An intermittent issue of malformed text on Vehicle Health Report page.

Thanks for your comments and feedback, we are constantly looking for ways to improve the app performance and add features. Your feedback allows us to focus on what matters the most to you.
Here are some of the updates you’ll find in this release:
[new] We have added new features for the 18 MY Range Rover and Range Rover Sport PHEV (Plug-In Hybrid Electric Vehicle P400e). We have also added remote seat fold/unfold functionality to the 18 MY Range Rover.
[new} Users will have the ability to manually refresh while using the app
[new] App is now available in Estonia, Finland, Greece, Latvia, Lithuania, Romania, Slovakia, Turkey
Here is a list of the issues we fixed in this release:
[fixed] Toggling between Imperial and Metric units in apple watch
[fixed] When reviewing journeys on journeys page, days from the current month can now be minimised
[fixed] Security text on home screen stays yellow even after alarm off
[fixed] Text cutoff and animation issues on smaller and older devices

We upgraded the interface between the app and “the cloud”. Please note that this is a mandatory update and that previous versions of the app will stop working shortly.
Please update to the new version as soon as possible.
